name: World's Worst Hitman
description:
World's Worst Hitman was made in 12 days for Inspire Jam 2022.

Inspired by IOI's HITMAN series, World's Worst Hitman puts you in control of the worst man for the job - and with your handler declaring you a lost cause, even the target's identity is unknown.

It's up to you to explore the museum, learn your target's identity, and kill them before inevitably getting caught. 

Good luck, agent. You'll need it. 

CREDITS - Goblin Grove Games
